verses.verse: And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> to him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with him, and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great:<s%> and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by a <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> to the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H4932>second<s%> order, and the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>door,<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were made for <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and for the <S%H842>grove,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and he <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of them to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H7673>put<s%> <S%H7673>down<s%> the <S%H3649>idolatrous<s%> priests, <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>ordained<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> places in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the places <S%H4524>round<s%> about <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> them also that <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and to the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and to the <S%H4208>planets,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H842>grove<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H1854>stamped<s%> it <S%H1854>small<s%> to <S%H6083>powder,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H6083>powder<s%> thereof on the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And he <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H6945>sodomites,<s%> that were by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H707>wove<s%> <S%H1004>hangings<s%> for the <S%H842>grove.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> out of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense,<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H5422>broke<s%> down the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> that were in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> in of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H8040>left<s%> hand at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places <S%H5927>came<s%> not up to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> but they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And he <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> might make his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech.<s%>

And he <S%H7673>took<s%> <S%H7673>away<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> that the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the <S%H935>entering<s%> in of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> by the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H5419>Nathanmelech<s%> the <S%H5631>chamberlain,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H6503>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H4196>altars<s%> that were <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5422>beat<s%> down, and <S%H7323>broke<s%> them <S%H7323>down<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron.<s%>

And the <S%H1116>high<s%> places that were <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H4889>corruption,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6252>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> and for <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> and for <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2930>defile.<s%>

And he <S%H7665>broke<s%> in pieces the <S%H4676>images,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> down the <S%H842>groves,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H4725>places<s%> with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was at <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and the <S%H1116>high<s%> place <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> that <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1116>high<s%> place he <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> place, and <S%H1854>stamped<s%> it <S%H1854>small<s%> to <S%H6083>powder,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H842>grove.<s%>

And as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> himself, he <S%H7200>spied<s%> the <S%H6913>sepulchers<s%> that were <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> out of the <S%H6913>sepulchers,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H2930>polluted<s%> it, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6725>title<s%> is that that I <S%H7200>see?<s%> And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> him, It is the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3240>Let<s%> him alone; <S%H3240>let<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5128>move<s%> his <S%H6106>bones.<s%> So they let his <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H4422>alone,<s%> with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> out of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places that were in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> to provoke the Lord to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> <S%H5493>away,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> to them according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>acts<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H2076>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> places that were <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> on them, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6213>Keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H3588>Surely<s%> there was not <S%H6213>held<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H6453>passover<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> that <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

But in the <S%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> wherein <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%> was <S%H6213>held<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the workers with familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> and the <S%H8655>images,<s%> and the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> that were <S%H7200>spied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> did <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away,<s%> that he might <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which were <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> that <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3644>like<s%> to him was there <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, that <S%H7725>turned<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3966>might,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H6965>arose<s%> there any <S%H3644>like<s%> him.

<S%H389>Notwithstanding<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> not from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>wrath,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3708>provocations<s%> that <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H3707>provoked<s%> him with.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> as I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H3988>cast<s%> off <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6549>Pharaohnechoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him; and he <S%H4191>slew<s%> him at <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> when he had <S%H7200>seen<s%> him.

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in a chariot <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6900>sepulcher.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him, and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

<S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that his <S%H1>fathers<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>
